entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Burwash Landing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
